Text: Is this the whole thing or only the length of the Album? If its the whole movie then I would love to see the kids faces as it plays....not to mention the surprise on the womans face....Floyd fanatical she is :)
This movie is full length with the album looped to play about 2 1/4 times.
retarded intro, and stupid text has been placed intermittently throughout the film. whoever made this fails hard.
Congrats batdave0 ... Without any doubts whatsoever, the best version of this that I have come across ... have you any more gems like this planned ???
